snippet.title: The First Descendant│TOKYO GAME SHOW 2022 Trailer (4K)
snippet.description:
Get a look at The First Descendant’s attractive and unique characters’ thrilling shooting action and 
be ready for the Steam Beta test in October!
Sign Up Now: https://nexon.link/8Un 
*Steam Beta Period: October 20th - October 26th (PDT)

The First Descendant is a third-person cooperative action RPG shooter
where you will inherit unknown powers as a Descendant 
to defend humans from invaders.

Subscribe to our YouTube channel and receive our latest news!
https://nexon.link/8SJ 

#TheFirstDescendant #TFD #lootershooter #shooter #coop #action #RPG #UE5 #UnrealEngine5 #betatest #TOKYOGAMESHOW #TOKYOGAMESHOW2022
